meanings.definition: Extremely serious or grave in manner or attitude.
meanings.sent1: She had an ultraserious expression when discussing the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent2: The doctor's ultraserious demeanor indicated the severity of the situation.
meanings.sent3: Despite his ultraserious look, he couldn't resist cracking a smile at the puppy.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraserious tone cut through the room, silencing all chatter.
meanings.sent5: The ultraserious warning in his eyes made everyone pay attention.

meanings.definition: Showing or characterized by extreme seriousness.
meanings.sent1: The ultraserious student never missed a deadline.
meanings.sent2: His ultraserious approach to work earned him respect from his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: Even in the most casual situations, she maintained an ultraserious demeanor.
meanings.sent4: The ultraserious atmosphere in the courtroom made everyone tense.
meanings.sent5: His ultraserious commitment to his goals inspired those around him.
